pages.text: The texture wrench is a multi-functional tool, which can be used to cycle through different textures of a block. Take a furnace, for example. This block has 3 different textures: one for the front face, one for the three side faces and one for the top and bottom faces. By right-clicking a frame block mimicking a furnace with the wrench, you
can cycle through all available textures.
For illusion blocks, you will instead rotate the whole model, like you would turn over the block. Here again shown with the furnace as an example.
